headline: LAMINAIRE LAMINAR FLOW WORK STATION
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Laminaire
Model DWS 636
Description Laminar Flow Work Station
Other Information Filter:
Three inch HEPA (High Efficiency Particulate Air) type, aerosol challenged, zero probed.
Aluminum frame minipleat design, minimum efficiency of 99.99% at .3 microns
Pre-Filter:
1" bonded polyfiber media minimizes surface-loading.
Quick-release aluminum frame. Easily accessible from front of unit. 78 % arrestance – 56-57 ASHRAE
Features:
Front panel light and blower switches
Magnehelic pressure gauge
Power Requirements 115 V 15.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 71.000 in (180.3 cm)
Depth 38.000 in (96.5 cm)
Height 110.000 in (279.4 cm)
Weight 629 lb (285 kg)
